thread.title: Ground News - Israeli tanks push deep into central Gaza town; Palestinians flee in mass exodus
thread.title_full: Ground News - Israeli tanks push deep into central Gaza town; Palestinians flee in mass exodus

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Israeli tanks push deep into central Gaza town; Palestinians flee in mass exodus
text:
Summary by Ground News Israeli forces attacked areas of the central and southern Gaza Strip where residents have been expecting a renewed ground offensive. Areas crammed with tens of thousands of Palestinians already displaced by the Israeli- Hamas war. Egypt confirms it has put forward a framework proposal to end the conflict between Israel and Hamas in the Gaza Strip. Share menu More

2 hours ago · Singapore Read Full Article Devdiscourse Center High Factuality WRAPUP 1-Israeli tanks, missiles strike Gaza in offensive against Hamas Israeli forces attacked areas of the central and southern Gaza Strip where residents have been expecting a renewed ground offensive in areas crammed with tens of thousands of Palestinians already displaced by the Israeli-Hamas war. With nightfall on Thursday, an Israeli airstrike on a house in the southern city of Khan Younis killed eight Palestinians, health officials said.

With nightfall on Thursday, an Israeli airstrike on a house in the southern city of Khan Younis killed eight Palestinians, health officials said.
35 minutes ago Read Full Article Aleph News LIVE UPDATES. VIDEO. War in Israel, Day 83. Thousands of Palestinians flee central Gaza as Israeli troops advance The Israel Defense Forces told the BBC it “regrets the harm caused” to civilians in the attack on the Maghazi refugee camp in Gaza on December 24, which killed 86 people. The IDF admitted that the wrong armament was used, causing “extensive collateral damage”. The Hamas-run Health Ministry said 210 Palestinians had been killed in Israeli strikes over the past 24 hours, bringing the total death toll in the Gaza Strip since October 7 to more than …
